member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSchemaConfig.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour
member.summary: Determines the behavior of the DeleteDatabase() function. Default value is DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.ModelObjectsOnly.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSchemaConfig.AuthorizationUsername
member.summary: The authorization user name. This option affect the CreateDatabase() behavior if the DeleteDatabaseBehaviour option is set to DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSchemaConfig.Extensions
member.summary: The list of database extensions. This option affect the CreateDatabase() behavior if the DeleteDatabaseBehaviour option is set to DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Database.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderTableConfig.Tablespace
member.summary: The tablespace for the created table.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderForeignKeyConfig.Enabled
member.summary: When set to false, this property makes the provider turn off the generation of foreign keys. This option affects the CreateDatabase() and Code-First Migrations behavior. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderForeignKeyConfig.IndexCreation
member.summary: When set to true, an index is created to the reference table columns. This option affects the CreateDatabase() behavior. The default value is true.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour
member.summary: Determines the behavior of the DeleteDatabase() functionality.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.ModelObjectsOnly
member.summary: Only the tables that model objects are mapped to are deleted. This is the default value.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.AllSchemaObjects
member.summary: All tables will be deleted from schemas that model objects were mapped to.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema
member.summary: Entire schema is deleted. If the model contains objects from other schemas, these schemas will be deleted as well.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Database
member.summary: Entire database is deleted.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderConfig
member.summary: Devart dotConnect for PostgreSQL Entity Framework provider configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderConfig.SqlFormatting
member.summary: SQL formatting configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderConfig.QueryOptions
member.summary: SELECT command options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderConfig.DmlOptions
member.summary: DML options influence only the INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE commands and Stored Procedure calls. SELECT commands are not affected by these options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderConfig.DatabaseScript
member.summary: Dynamic database generation/dropping configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderConfig.Workarounds
member.summary: Common workarounds.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderConfig.CodeFirstOptions
member.summary: Code-First and Code-First Migrations options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderConfig.SpatialOptions
member.summary: Spatial options.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig
member.summary: SQL formatting configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.ExtraSpaces
member.summary: Determines whether to insert spaces between operators and operands and after commas. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.MultilineStatements
member.summary: Determines whether to split statements to several lines. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.Indenting
member.summary: Determines whether to indent keywords in multi-line queries. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.ColumnListStacking
member.summary: Disables inserting new lines in the SELECT list. Default value is true.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderQueryConfig
member.summary: SELECT command options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderQueryConfig.NoEscapeLike
member.summary: The possibility to turn off ESCAPE in LIKE expression. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderQueryConfig.CaseInsensitiveLike
member.summary: The possibility to turn on the case insensitive comparison mode, when using Linq to Entities extension methods .Contains(), .EndsWith(), .StartsWith(). The default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderQueryConfig.CaseInsensitiveComparison
member.summary: The possibility to turn on the case insensitive comparison mode, when using LINQ to Entities comparison expression such as "a == b". The default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour
member.summary: Determines how the NULL values are inserted.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertNull
member.summary: In this case nulls are inserted explicitly (for each column that do not have a non-NULL value specified).

member.name: F:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertDefaultOrNull
member.summary: In this case provider determines if there is a default value specified in the SSDL part of the model, and if it is available, this value is persisted to database. If there is no default value specified, the behaviour is identical to the InsertNull one.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertDefaultOrOmit
member.summary: In this case provider determines if there is a default value specified in the SSDL part of the model as well. However, if there is no default value specified for a column, it is omitted from the INSERT command completely.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.Omit
member.summary: In this case provider simply omits all columns that do not have non-NULL values.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderDmlConfig
member.summary: DML options influence only the INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE commands and Stored Procedure calls. SELECT commands are not affected by these options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.ParametersAsLiterals
member.summary: Determines if parameter values are inserted into SQL statements as literals instead of parameters. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.InsertNullBehaviour
member.summary: Determines how the NULL values are inserted. Default value is InsertNullBehaviour.InsertNull.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.ReuseParameters
member.summary: Enables reusing existing parameters instead of creating a new ones. Set this property to true only in case if a large number of the same values is sent to the database. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.BatchUpdates
member.summary: Batch Updates functionality configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.EmptyUpdates
member.summary: When set to false, this property makes the provider turn off the generation of fake updates for parent entities. The default value is true.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig
member.summary: Batch Updates functionality configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.Enabled
member.summary: Enables or disables Batch Updates functionality. If set to false, other BatchUpdates settings are ignored. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.BatchSize
member.summary: Specifies the maximal number of commands in a batch. Default value is 30.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.AsynchronousBatch
member.summary: Specifies whether batches are executed asynchronously (false by default), or new batch will be created and executed only after the successful execution of the previous batch. Default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig
member.summary: Common workarounds.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.IgnoreSchemaName
member.summary: When set to true, this property makes provider to remove the schema (database) name from all commands and queries, no matter whether Schema specified in the model or not. Command will be using the schema from the connection. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.IgnoreDboSchemaName
member.summary: When set to true, this property makes provider to remove the "dbo" schema (database) name from all commands and queries. Command will be using the schema from the connection. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.DisableQuoting
member.summary: Disables quoting all identifiers in all queries and commands. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.UseInvariantProviderManifestToken
member.summary: If set to true, the invariant string literal is always returned as the provider manifest token. Default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig
member.summary: Code-First and Code-First Migrations options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.DisableIndexQuoting
member.summary: Disables quoting all indexes in Code-First Migrations. Use DisableIndexQuoting for backward compatibility with old Code-First Migrations projects (migrations created and applied with 5.xx versions of dotConnect for PostgreSQL). Do not use this configuration option with new projects. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.RemoveSchemaFromDefaultConstraintName
member.summary: When set to true, the schema (database) name prefix is removed from default constraint names (primary keys, foreign keys) generated by Code-First Migrations. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.AddTableNameInDefaultIndexName
member.summary: When set to true, the table name is added to default index name generated by Code-First Migrations (like 'IX_TableName_ColumnName'). When set to false, then default index names will be like 'IX_ColumnName'. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.TruncateLongDefaultNames
member.summary: When set to true, long default names of indexes, primary keys, and foreign keys, generated by Code-First Migrations, will be truncated and renamed if they exceed the limit of 63 characters. When set to false, an exception will be raised for long default names generated by Code-First Migrations if they are too long. This option does not affect the truncation of long default names generated by Code-First CreateDatabase() and DropDatabase() functionality. They are always truncated if they exceed the limit of 63 characters. However it affects the algorithm of this truncation and renaming of these identifiers. When it is set to true, the names of these identifiers are identical both in Code-First CreateDatabase() and in Code-First Migrations. Default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig
member.summary: Spatial options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeometryDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeographyDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is 4326 (WGS84).

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.AlwaysUseGeometryDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.AlwaysUseGeographyDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeographyDistanceUnit
member.summary: Default value is 'Meter'.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeographyAreaUnit
member.summary: Default value is 'SquareMeter'.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.UseGeographySpheroidMeasurement
member.summary: Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Configuration.PgSqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeometryBufferStyleParameters
member.summary: Default value is empty string.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.PgSqlSpatialFunctions
member.summary: PostgreSQL PostGIS spatial functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.PgSqlJsonFunctions
member.summary: PostgreSQL JSON functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.PgSqlJsonbFunctions
member.summary: PostgreSQL JSONB functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.PgSqlTextFunctions
member.summary: PostgreSQL full-text search functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlAddColumnConfiguration
member.summary: AddColumn operation can be customized with the PgSqlAddColumnConfiguration class.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlAddColumnConfiguration.NotNullConstraintName
member.summary: The name of the NOT NULL constraint. By default, an unnamed NOT NULL constraint is created

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlAddColumnConfiguration.CheckConstraintName
member.summary: The name of the check constraint.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlAddColumnConfiguration.CheckConstraintColumnRestriction
member.summary: The expression of the сheck constraint (for example, “IN (‘A’, ‘B’, ‘C’)”).

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlAddColumnConfiguration.CheckConstraintExpression
member.summary: The full expression of the сheck constraint (for example, “COLUMN_NAME IN (‘A’, ‘B’, ‘C’)”).

member.name: T:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlCreateIndexConfiguration
member.summary: CreateIndex operation can be customized with the PgSqlCreateIndexConfiguration class.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlCreateIndexConfiguration.Expression
member.summary: Specifies the expression for the expression-based (function-based) index.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlCreateIndexConfiguration.IndexType
member.summary: Determines whether to use B-tree, Hash, GiST or GIN index types.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlCreateIndexConfiguration.UseToTsVectorFunction
member.summary: Determines whether to use the TO_TSVECTOR function for conversion of a string column to the TSVECTOR data type for GiST or GIN index types. When set to 'false', index declaration will be like ''CREATE INDEX IndexName ON TableName USING GIST(ColumnName)''. When set to 'true', index declaration will be like ''CREATE INDEX IndexName ON TableName USING GIST(to_tsvector('english', ColumnName)))''. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.Entity.Migrations.PgSqlCreateIndexConfiguration.ToTsVectorConfigName
member.summary: Configuration name for the TO_TSVECTOR function. When UseToTsVectorFunction is set to 'true', index declaration will be like ''CREATE INDEX IndexName ON TableName USING GIST(to_tsvector('ToTsVectorConfigName', ColumnName)))''.
